original_title: 誘惑えもーしょん 佐山愛
overview: A live-action adaptation of a popular comic that is seduced by violently swaying big tits and gets vaginal cum shot! ! Sweetly seduced by a "lonely married woman", seduced by the gap between a "strong woman", seduced by the sad expression of a "widow". ! What kind of temptation do you like...?
title: Alluring Emotion – Ai Sayama
